data.title: Joey Barton: Latest news, gossip, photos and video
data.meta_description: Get the latest news and updates on Joey Barton - the former professional footballer - from Mail Online.
data.text:
Sexism and misogyny is on the rise in English football, new data reveals, in same week Joey Barton is charged with alleged 'malicious communications towards Eni Aluko'

Reports of that type of discrimination rose by a further 44 per cent from 80 in 2022-23 to 115 last season, having shot up by over 400 per cent from 2021-22 to 2022-23.

Joey Barton calls on Elon Musk to 'step up to the plate' to protect freedom of speech after he was charged with alleged 'malicious communications' towards Eni Aluko

In a ten paragraph long post on X, the Musk-owned social media platform, Barton has claimed that the British judicial system is being used to 'target people who have a dissenting voice.'

Joey Barton charged with alleged 'malicious communications towards Eni Aluko' - as former Man City midfielder claims British legal system is 'becoming a Banana Republic' after previously comparing pundit to serial killers Fred and Rose West in January

Barton has been charged with alleged 'malicious communications' towards Aluko. He will appear in court on July 30 after an investigation by Cheshire Police.

Joey Barton will face criminal trial in November over claim he assaulted his wife in drunken row two days before their anniversary

The 41-year-old former footballer has been accused of leaving his wife Georgia Barton, 36, with a 'golf ball' sized-lump on her head after downing four bottles of wine.

Mason Greenwood lands in France to join Marseille as Joey Barton defends his £30m move from Man United and insists 'England would have won the Euros with this kid in the side'

Marseille have reached an agreement in principle to sign Greenwood from Manchester United for £27million plus £3.2m in add-ons.

Eni Aluko is suing Joey Barton following claims he made about her family and after the ex-Bristol Rovers boss likened her to 'Rose West' on X

Joey Barton, 41, is facing yet another legal battle after Eni Aluko took a defamation and harassment lawsuit to the High Court over tweets he made about her family and female football punditry

Joey Barton will have to pay Jeremy Vine an extra £35,000 after libelling him - bringing total bill to £110,000 plus legal costs

Joey Barton will have to pay a further £35,000 in damages to settle a High Court libel claim with Jeremy Vine on top of a £75,000 payment, the broadcaster's solicitors have said.

Jeremy Vine says Joey Barton agreeing to pay £75,000 in damages is NOT the final outcome in libel case - after ex-footballer lied and falsely claimed BBC star had a 'sexual interest in children'

Jeremy Vine has said that Joey Barton agreeing to pay him £75,000 in damages is not the final outcome in their libel case.

Jeremy Vine flashes a smile after Joey Barton gives him grovelling apology and agrees to pay him £75,000 after lying BBC presenter had 'a sexual interest in children'

Former Manchester City and England player Barton, 41, been forced to share an online apology to Vine - having previously used the platform to label him a 'nonce'.

Joey Barton will face criminal trial over claim he assaulted his wife in drunken row, High Court judges rule after case was paused when she sent letter to prosecutors retracting her allegations

Joey Barton faces a new criminal trial over an allegation he assaulted his wife, judges at the High Court have ruled. .

Joey Barton brands Gary Lineker 'crisp nonce' - just a week after judge ruled similar vile post about Jeremy Vine was defamatory

The 41-year-old made the vile comment about the Match of the Day presenter on X earlier today, seemingly referencing Linker's role as a brand ambassador for Walkers.

ITV pundit Lucy Ward lands jibe at Joey Barton after he lost 'bike nonce' libel showdown with Jeremy Vine - months after the former footballer compared her and Eni Aluko to Fred and Rose West: 'Freedom of speech is quite clearly NOT freedom of consequence'

ITV football pundit Lucy Ward has today hit out at Joey Barton after he lost a libel case brought by Jeremy Vine where it was ruled that calling the broadcaster a 'bike nonce' was defamatory.

Joey Barton loses 'bike nonce' libel showdown with Jeremy Vine after judge rules vile post was defamatory

The radio and TV presenter sued the former footballer for libel and harassment over 14 online posts, including one where he called Mr Vine a 'big bike nonce' and a 'pedo defender' on X.

Joey Barton could face assault trial over claims he attacked his wife in drunken row at their home after prosecutors call for proceedings which were halted two years ago to resume

The former footballer was accused of assaulting his wife Georgia in a drunken row outside their home in Kew, south-west London in June 2021.

Jeremy Vine sues Joey Barton for calling him a 'big bike nonce' - as the ex-football manager's tweets land him in trouble once again

Mr Vine, 58, says after he was called the term on X, millions of people have read the post which accused him of having a 'sexual interest in children'.

Joey Barton launches blistering attack on Gary Neville, bizarrely calling him 'a little shop steward' and claiming he 'knows NOTHING' about football - months after grim threat to 'empty him'

Barton has previously made Neville the focus of his ire on social media, and wasted no time sharing a comment in response to a video of Neville speaking ahead of this season.

Joey Barton bafflingly claims 'genetically modified' Lionel Messi should have ASTERISK next to his titanic achievements due to the treatment the World Cup winner received as child for rare growth hormone deficiency

Joey Barton has launched his latest tirade in the direction of Lionel Messi , by claiming that there should be an asterisk to his name due to the medical treatment he received as a child.

Police confirm they HAVE been chasing Joey Barton for an interview over his outspoken tweets after former football star claimed UK was like North Korea

Cheshire Police confirmed they had received 'reports of offences under the Communications Act' and had sought to make 'multiple attempts' to interview the former midfielder.

Joey Barton says he's been visited by police 'four times in three days' over his tweets and hits out at 'an attempt to intimidate me and my family'... as he compares the UK to North Korea

The ex-Man City footballer has come under fire this year for his vile tweets about women working in men's football, infamously claiming female pundits 'shouldn't be talking with any authority' in the game.

EPISODE 45: It's All Kicking Off! - Why Joey Barton is way out of line

In the latest episode of 'It's All Kicking Off!' the lads once again delve into the attacking issues at Arsenal as Chris gives his take on why Kai Havertz might be struggling up top

'Bully Joey Barton hauled me out to do 50 keepy-ups and then told staff I'm s***': English football's youngest head of recruitment, 23, opens up on ex-Bristol Rovers manager - who fires back that he's 'full of lies'

English football's youngest head of recruitment has described Joey Barton as a 'bully' after a negative experience working with him at Bristol Rovers.

Joey Barton reveals which player he thinks was 'miles above' the others in the Steven Gerrard, Frank Lampard and Paul Scholes debate as he suggests 'it's not even close'

Joey Barton has revealed that he believes there is a clear winner in the debate between who was the greater player out of Steven Gerrard , Frank Lampard and Paul Scholes.

Rangers slam 'homophobic' and 'misogynistic' comments made by Joey Barton following their Sky Sports Cup final... after former Ibrox midfielder mocked Partick Thistle's teenage goalkeeper Ava Easdon on social media

Rangers hit out at 'homophobic' and 'misogynistic' comments that have been made about women's football in the wake of last Sunday's Sky Sports Cup final at Tynecastle.

Joey Barton doubles down in attack on 17-year-old female goalkeeper - even as her former kickboxer world champ dad backs calls for a charity boxing fight - as he asks Sky Sports to take women's football off-air

After Rangers' first goal in the showpiece event - their 4-1 victory was shown on Sky Sports - Easdon was criticised on social media and the former Man City and QPR midfielder joined in.

Shame on Joey Barton and his 2.8m lapdogs for mocking a 17-year-old kid, writes ALISON McCONNELL. His nasty nature has brutally exposed her to the very worst elements of playing football

ALISON MCCONNELL: Still at school and thrust into the cup final because regular custodian Megan Cunningham was ineligible Easdon did not need the pile-on that was to come.

Joey Barton is accused of 'BULLYING' a 17-year-old women's goalkeeper - by her kickboxing world champion dad - after he mocked her mistake in a cup final in latest attack on women's sport

After Rangers' first goal in the showpiece event - which was shown on Sky Sports - Easdon was criticised on social media and the former Man City and QPR midfielder joined in.

Don't mess with our England flag! Football fans slam 'woke' St George's symbol on official Euro kit as they demand shirts are taken off Nike and given to a British firm (and even say Joey Barton is right THIS time!)

Football fans have slammed the ' woke ' St George's symbol on the new kit and demand the shirts are taken off Nike and given to a British firm.

Joey Barton signs petition with over 5000 signatures demanding the St. George flag on Nike's new England kit is changed

Joey Barton is the latest England fan to voice their outrage over the 'playful update' to the St George's Cross on the back of Nike's new England shirt.

Joey Barton is ridiculed for taking a pop at England stars for 'training in diamond earrings' and trying to 'look like Drake' as he says 'they won't win a sausage'... while commenting on a picture of treble winner Kyle Walker!

England are currently in training at St. George's Park ahead of a round of friendlies against Brazil and Belgium, with Gareth Southgate having named his squad last week for both games.

Joey Barton launches GoFundMe campaign as the outspoken former footballer claims Jeremy Vine's lawsuit could 'easily cost £500,000'... after the broadcaster sued over 'bike nonce' social media jibe

Joey Barton has launched a fundraising campaign after BBC Radio 2 presenter Jeremy Vine took legal action following the former footballer labelling him a 'bike nonce' on social media.

Jeremy Vine joins football pundit Eniola Aluko and sues Joey Barton over 'bike nonce' social media jibe

The Radio 2 presenter filed a defamation claim last week after posts made by Barton compared Vine to paedophiles such as Rolf Harris , according to The Sun.

Joey Barton will cancel his Sky subscription and won't sign up again until female pundits are removed from their football coverage as he continues his tirades against women covering the men's game

Barton has now taken matters a step further and claimed that he will not sign up to Sky again unless the shows are improved and female pundits are removed.

Joey Barton accuses ex-Man United star Dwight Yorke of 'turning his back on' his son Harvey, who he shares with Katie Price, and suggests his plans to buy a football team to appoint a black manager is 'reverse racism'

Joey Barton has blasted Dwight Yorke's plan to buy a football club to appoint a black manager and savaged the ex-Man United's star's professional and personal conduct.

Joey Barton accuses Alex Scott of putting BBC's Football Focus 'in the ground', as he insists plummeting viewing figures are due to the presenter 'boring people to death'

Barton has repeatedly called for women to not be allowed to work in men's football in recent months on his social media, and referred to Scott last week as the 'Ted Bundy of presenting'.

Eni Aluko accuses Joey Barton of 'deliberately' targeting her and putting her through 'one of the WORST cases of social media abuse I've ever experienced'

Joey Barton has regularly called for women to not be involved in men's football in recent months, and has singled out female pundit Eni Aluko in several posts on his X account.

Joey Barton brands BBC's chief fact-checker a 'woke liar' over her coverage of his 'vomit of hatred' at TV football pundit Eni Aluko, whose work he likened to Fred and Rose West

The 41-year-old disparaged Aluko's appearance on BBC's Why Do You Hate Me? podcast, where she described the social media site as being a place where people can 'vomit their hatred'.

Joey Barton doubles down in attack on Lionesses hero goalkeeper Mary Earps - insisting he would score '1,000 out of 1,000 penalties against her'... and that women's football's best teams would not survive in the men's fifth tier

Joey Barton has renewed his attack on England star Mary Earps, insisting he would score '1,000 out of 1,000 penalties' against the Lionesses goalkeeper in his latest tirade against women's football.

Joey Barton attacks England's Lionesses as 'slow and error-strewn' as he joins the anger at Sadiq Khan's £6m taxpayer-funded 'virtue-signalling' Overground rebrand

Barton has been widely condemned for his attacks on female pundits, even going as far as invoking the names of serial killers Fred and Rose West when making vindictive remarks online.

Joey Barton DELETES his latest tweet about Eni Aluko as she confirms she's taking legal action to stop his 'entirely untrue' posts about TV football pundit, which claimed her family used 'dodgy money' to pay for a lavish lifestyle

In a statement made by Eni Aluko, the TV pundit has labelled Barton's comments as 'untrue' and 'inaccurate' before confirming legal action will be taken against the ex-Premier League player.

Joey Barton publicly posts ITV football pundit Eni Aluko's legal letters as she sues him for causing 'extreme upset and distress' - which he dismisses as 'saying she's not very good at her job'

Barton has been widely condemned for his attacks on female pundits, even going as far as invoking the names of serial killers Fred and Rose West when making vindictive remarks online.

Ex-Chelsea star ditched Match of the Day to become a PASTOR, supports Joey Barton, and claims women should be the 'submissive helper' in relationships

The transition from playing to punditry is a well-trodden path in football, and was the one Gavin Peacock initially looked set to master when he hung up his boots in 2002.

Eric Dier is already trying some 'German', Joey Barton put on a 'ridiculous' French voice, and Steve McClaren had a disastrous attempt at Dutch... when Brits abroad get their accents HORRIBLY wrong

Eric Dier made his Bayern Munich debut on Wednesday night less than two weeks after joining from Tottenham, but it was not his football that got people talking.

Joey Barton ridicules Nedum Onuoha over claims he could have been a Premier League striker after his former Man City team-mate labelled his outspoken ex-team-mate a 'bully' after his tirades at female football pundits

In recent months, Barton has made a number of sexist rants against several female former players, pundits and commentators having a role in the coverage and analysis of men's football.

Now Joey Barton says he 'feels SORRY' for ITV football pundit Eni Aluko before suggesting she 'can't count' and 'shouldn't be in her position' as he calls for TV execs to take her off-air

Joey Barton has called on TV execs to take female pundits off air and continued his onslaught of criticism directed at Eni Aluko, suggesting she 'can't count' and 'feels sorry' for her.

Jermaine Jenas repeatedly calls player by the wrong name during Brighton's draw with Wolves - as social media users joke TNT Sport pundit's gaffe will put hypercritical Joey Barton on alert

Jenas was on commentary for the clash between Brighton and Wolves on TNT Sports, but fans quickly realised that he was repeating the same mistake during the game.

Joey Barton and Blackburn Rovers become embroiled in spat after he posted an old video of the town... as the club order him NOT to 'bring our town' into his 'public meltdown' and he hits back

The ex-Manchester City footballer shared a video showing schoolkidswalking through the town's streets and suggested we 'never talk about equity' over 'diversity, equality, and inclusion'.

Nedum Onuoha labels Joey Barton as a 'BULLY' as he recalls former Man City and QPR team-mate's antics during playing career... and claims the ex-footballer 'lacks perspective'

In recent months, Barton has made a number of sexist rants against several female former players, pundits and commentators having a role in the coverage and analysis of men's football.

Ranting football attention-seeker Joey Barton is slapped down by Rishi Sunak who brands him 'completely ridiculous' after his sexist comments on female football commentators

The Prime Minister has hit back at sexist comments made by former professional footballer Joey Barton who suggested that women should not commentate on men's football.

Eni Aluko and Lucy Ward 'seek legal advice' over Joey Barton attacks... after the former footballer's sick comparison of the female pundits to serial killers Fred and Rose West

ITV pundits Eni Aluko and Lucy Ward are reportedly taking legal action against Joey Barton over the former footballer's controversial social media posts.

Controversial Premier League star Joey Barton slams Sam Kerr's skills in yet another sexist attack on women's football

Former Manchester City and Newcastle midfielder Joey Barton has launched another sexist attack on women in football, this time roping in Australian skipper Sam Kerr.

Joey Barton, the washed-up footballer now trying to make a career out of being an obnoxious bully to women: No one denies his right to criticise female commentators... but he can't tell the difference between debate and vile abuse

NEIL TWEEDIE: Joey Barton needs a new career, now that football has tired of his excesses and his chosen battlefield of the moment is women and football commentary.

Joey Barton faces government action over his 'dangerous and disgusting comments' as UK sport minister vows to crack down on former footballer's vile sexist rants by holding social media companies accountable

Britain's sports minister Stuart Andrew has vowed to put pressure on social media companies in the wake of Joey Barton's 'dangerous and disgusting comments'.

Joey Barton is 'indefensible', 'hurtful', and 'hateful' for comparing female pundits to serial killers, STEPHEN WRIGHT tells It's All Kicking Off, as he says he 'crossed the line by several country miles'

Stephen Wright was speaking to It's All Kicking Off hosts Ian Ladyman and Chris Sutton on the back of his powerful article in which he said Barton's serial killer comparison was an obscene new low.

Joey Barton claims his relentless tirade against women in football is 'a duty to a great grandfather who was gassed at Ypres in 1915' during WWI... as he vows 'you have to kill me to cancel me'

Barton has faced intense criticism in recent weeks for a series of misogynistic barbs against women working in the game, who he claims 'aren't qualified' to talk about men's football.

Joey Barton continues his tirade on Eni Aluko as he bizarrely claims the TV pundit is 'clearly in the Joseph Stalin category' for 'murdering hundreds of thousands of fans' ears', after making sick 'Fred and Rose West' jibe

Joey Barton has continued his vicious online tirade on Eni Aluko after claiming the TV pundit is 'in the Joseph Stalin category' for 'murdering hundreds of thousands of ears'.

Can he get any lower? Now Joey Barton claims women in football slept their way to the top and 'violated marriages' in latest vile sexist rant sent from the beach... sat in peaceful meditation pose

The ex-Manchester City player hit out at those seemingly criticising him for his recent sexist campaign against female pundits and players as he claimed to have 'plenty to fight...back with'.

STEPHEN WRIGHT: Comparing female pundits to depravity of serial killers is an obscene new low for deluded, sexist thug Joey Barton

In the Autumn of 1995 I spent seven weeks covering the prosecution of West which, in terms of horror, is without parallel during my 30-year crime reporting career at the Daily Mail.

Joey Barton accuses ITV of a 'cover up' of the Phillip Schofield scandal as he launches an unhinged attack on the channel after referencing Fred and Rose West in jibe at their 'woke bulls***' use of two female pundits

Joey Barton has accused ITV of 'covering up' the Phillip Schofield scandal as the former footballer launched another social media attack on the broadcaster.

Joey Barton THREATENS Gary Neville, telling him 'keep your head down or you will get emptied'... after pundit called him out for comparing female pundits to serial killers

The 41-year-old sparked fury on Friday morning when he compared Eni Aluko and Lucy Ward to the Fred and Rose West - after they covered Crystal Palace's FA Cup draw with Everton.

'The Fred and Rose West of football commentary': Outrage as Joey Barton makes sickening jibe at ITV's two female FA Cup pundits

The former Man City and Newcastle midfielder has come under intense scrutiny in recent weeks for his controversial views on women working in men's football in a string of social media tirades.

Joey Barton reveals he had 'four pints' before launching his social media tirade against female pundits and insists he has had 'incredible feedback'... as he claims Karen Carney was 'underqualified' on Sky Sports

Joey Barton has claimed he had 'four pints' before his first controversial posts about female pundits in men's football, as he insisted he had received positive feedback from fans of both genders.

Roy Keane aims a dig at Joey Barton as he jokes he'd like to phone the former midfielder when asked a question on women's football

Barton has been in the headlines over the past month for a series of misogynistic posts on social media targeting former female footballers and broadcasters.

Joey Barton calls it 'nonsense' and 'tokenism' that ex-Liverpool Women's goalkeeper Rachel Brown-Finnis is included as expert by Amazon for the Reds' win over Burnley... as he carries on crusade against female pundits

It follows other posts aimed at broadcasters and ex-players, with Barton initially suggesting that 'women shouldn't be talking with any kind of authority in the men's game.'

Can Joey Barton REALLY lecture Mary Earps with his controversial track record? From attacking teammates with lit cigars, being jailed for assault and 'sexist' social media rants against women pundits

Bitter Joey Barton dubbed Earps a 'big sack of spuds', after she picked up her Sports Personality of the Year gong.

Joey Barton teases first clip of his new 'Common Sense' podcast as he discusses his 18-month gambling ban... after the ex-footballer's controversial sexist rants on social media

Joey Barton has shared a clip of his upcoming podcast series amid continued controversy over a series of sexist social media posts by the former footballer.

Joey Barton slams Mary Earps being named BBC Sports Personality of the Year and backs himself to score '100 out of 100 penalties' against the goalkeeper... despite having earlier congratulated the England star

Joey Barton has blasted England goalkeeper Mary Earps being crowned Sports Personality of the Year, as the former footballer hit out at 'BBC nonsense' following the public vote.

Mary Earps shrugs off BBC SPOTY row with cheeky TikTok as fans rally around 'inspirational' Lioness goalkeeper after Joey Barton brands her a 'big sack of spuds' who 'didn't win a sausage'

Earps, 30, was a key part of the Lionesses side which reached the Women's World Cup final in the summer and won FIFA's Golden Glove award for the best goalkeeper.

Alex Scott takes swipe at Joey Barton saying she won't use social media to 'bully and belittle others' as she promotes her book amidst former midfielder's sexist comments row

Alex Scott has taken a swipe at Joey Barton amidst the former Burnley and Marseille midfielder's sexist comments on female pundits.

Joey Barton claims Football Focus will be next after blaming 'wokeness' for the BBC cancelling A Question of Sport... as he aims another jibe at host Alex Scott by slamming the show as 'drivel and nonsense'

Joey Barton has suggested Football Focus could follow A Question of Sport being cancelled by the BBC, as he appeared to aim another jibe at the show's host Alex Scott.

Joey Barton responds to the appointment of Rebecca Welch as first female Premier League referee... amid his sexist tirade against women working as pundits in men's football

Welch will become the first female referee in the league's history to officiate a Premier League fixture on December 23, when she takes charge of Fulham's match against Burnley.

Joey Barton claims England's men would beat the Lionesses 30-0 in a single half of football after calling for women to 'stop trying to ruin our game' in latest sexist social media rant

Barton has made headlines of late for his rants against women in men's football, clashing with a number of analysts, commentators and pundits featuring in coverage for the men's game.

Joey Barton turns on Rio Ferdinand's YouTuber wing-man Ste Howson, calling the Man United influencer a 'Jersey Royal Headed buffoon' as he dredges up his controversial comment on the 1958 Munich air disaster

The former Man City man previously shared a series of misogynistic posts on social media that floated the idea that 'women shouldn't be talking with any kind of authority in the men's game'.

TV sports correspondent Carrie Brown admits working in football 'has sucked the joy out of me' after Joey Barton commented on her looks and said she 'shouldn't be seen near a football job'

Barton has sparked controversy in recent days over his misogynistic comments about women working in men's football and Brown has indirectly responded to a tweet from the ex-player.

Joey Barton tells Alex Scott she 'doesn't have a clue' and was a 'really bad player' after she spoke out in defence of female pundits in the men's game... before he messages her to insist he wants to avoid a 'row'

Speaking during the BBC's coverage of the Women's Super League fixture between Arsenal and Chelsea, Scott told women that 'football is a better place with us all in it'.

Joey Barton is ridiculed after his comments from 2017 resurface calling for Emma Hayes to 'cross over into the men's game' after the Chelsea boss hit back at the ex-City star's sexist tirade against female pundits in football

Barton has taken to social media to voice his opinion that women should not 'be talking about the men's game' and criticised any men that listen to what female pundits have to say.
